title: Font identify!
content:
Does anyone have any nice examples of the following fonts in use?  
Any ideas be HUGELY APPRECIATED!  
Thanks...

arnhem  
avant garde  
bell centennial  
bell gothic  
bembo  
benguiat gothic  
beowolf  
caslon  
clarendon  
cooper black  
dante  
courier  
din  
fedra  
fette fraktur  
franklin gothic  
futura  
garamond  
hoefler text  
interstate  
joanna  
knockout  
letter gothic  
lucida  
matrix  
officina  
optima  
palatino  
perpetua  
rockwell  
quadraat  
rosewood  
scala  
syntax  
thesis  
times new roman  
trade gothic  
trajan  
triplex  
univers  
walbaum  
zapfino
author: emilychicken

comments.content: :^) Didn’t you post this in the TYPE ID area? Double posting is mean. It confuses people. ;^)
have a look at the “FontsInUse” bundle here: [http://del.icio.us/stewf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609224623/http:/del.icio.us/stewf "http://del.icio.us/stewf")
to be honest, i’ve got a ridiculous deadline for this, and i thought good to cover all bases! thanks for your help people...

<cite>beowolf</cite>

Good luck finding that one outside of an article about beowolf…
